monster.name: Dryad, Urban
monster.type: fey, Xanathar's Lost Notes to Everything Else
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The urban dryad’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: druidcraft
2/day each: earth tremor, goodberry, thorn whip
1/day each: calm emotions, earthbind, pass without trace

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While hidden or resting, an urban dryad is indistinguishable from a mass of ivy creepers.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The urban dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
trait.text: The urban dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The urban dryad makes two lash attacks.

action.name: Lash
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target range 30/120. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

action.name: Shadow Walk
action.text: The urban dryad can step magically from one shadow within its reach and emerge from a second unoccupied shadow within 60 feet of the original shadow.

monster.type: fey, Xanathar's Lost Notes to Everything Else

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While hidden or resting, the sproutling is indistinguishable from a common weed.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The sproutling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
trait.text: The sproutling can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The urban sproutling makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 +2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

monster.name: Dryad, Elder
monster.type: fey, Xanathar's Lost Notes to Everything Else
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The urban dryad’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: commune with nature, meld into stone, sleep
3/day: spike growth
1/day: blight

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While hidden or resting, the elder dryad is indistinguishable from a flowering azalea or another local shrub.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The elder dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
trait.text: The elder dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The elder dryad makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

action.name: Entangling Roots
action.text: The elder dryad can animate roots in the ground in a 15-foot square within 30 feet of it. These roots turn the ground in that area into difficult terrain. A creature in that area when the effect begins must make a successful DC 15 Strength saving throw or be restrained by entangling roots. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a DC 15 Strength (Athletics) check, freeing itself on a successful check. The effect ends after 1 minute or when the elder dryad dies or uses entangling roots again.

action.name: Shadow Walk
action.text: Once on its turn, the elder dryad can step magically from one shadow within its reach and emerge from a second unoccupied shadow within 60 feet of the original shadow.

monster.name: Gen, Air
monster.type: elemental, Xanathar's Lost Notes to Everything Else
monster.resist: lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The gen’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect evil and good, gust
2/day each: fog cloud, plane shift (self only), tongues

trait.name: Elemental Demise
trait.text: If the gen dies, its body disintegrates into a warm breeze, leaving behind only equipment the gen was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The gen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gen makes two melee or two ranged attacks

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Thunderbolt
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target range 30/120. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) lightning damage.

action.name: Invisibility
action.text: The gen magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the gen wears or carries is invisible with it.

monster.name: Gen, Water
monster.type: elemental, Xanathar's Lost Notes to Everything Else

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The gen’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: detect evil and good, frostbite, shape water
2/day each: plane shift (self only)

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The gen can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
trait.text: If the gen dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the gen was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The gen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gen makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Tidal Wave (Recharge 6)
action.text: The gen creates a rushing wave of water in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature that fails its save is also pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

action.name: Invisibility
action.text: The gen magically turns invisible until it attacks or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the gen wears or carries is invisible with it.
